text: Transmitting Live is a 1994 live album by the Scottish Celtic rock band Runrig. ==Track listing== # Ùrlar (Floor) \- 2:10 # Àrd (High) \- 6:11 # Edge Of The World - 5:13 # The Greatest Flame - 6:18 # Harvest Moon - 6:11 # The Wire - 6:13 # Precious Years - 2:36 # Every River - 2:48 # Flower Of The West - 6:39 # Only The Brave - 4:34 # Alba (Scotland) \- 6:17 # Pòg Aon Oidhche Earraich (A Kiss One Spring Evening) \- 5:04 Category:Runrig albums Category:1994 live albums Category:Scottish Gaelic music
title: Transmitting Live
